Estimates of the Number of Currently Available Scientific and Technical Periodicals .A Barr, K. P. Published estimates of the number of scientific and technical periodicals currently being published are analyzed.. A new estimates is put forward based on the experience of the NLL in attempting to build up a comprehensive collection of the world's scientific and technical periodical literature.. .X 19	1	777 37	2	777 39	1	777 40	2	777 47	1	777 55	1	777 88	1	777 97	1	777 102	1	777 103	1	777 233	1	777 253	2	777 313	1	777 359	1	777 377	1	777 379	1	777 395	1	777 505	1	777 560	1	777 573	1	777 592	1	777 618	2	777 622	1	777 632	1	777 635	1	777 667	1	777 747	1	777 748	1	777 749	1	777 751	1	777 760	1	777 764	1	777 765	1	777 777	6	777 778	1	777 782	1	777 791	1	777 804	1	777 805	1	777 893	2	777 952	1	777 1016	1	777 1061	1	777 1085	2	777 1086	1	777 1087	1	777 1172	1	777 1182	1	777 1200	2	777 1274	1	777 1275	1	777 1277	1	777 1278	1	777 1280	1	777 1285	1	777 1287	1	777 1301	2	777 1302	2	777 1304	1	777 1313	1	777 1337	1	777 1338	2	777 1344	1	777 1347	1	777 1380	2	777 1428	1	777 1444	1	777 1444	1	777
